edu.spaced.simulation
Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
  edu.spaced.simulation.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
JoinListener, PartListener
public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements JoinListener, PartListener

Manages a running game simulation. This class only handles the logic of it's interaction and does not handle visualization. A simulation has only one active level and a set of active entities.

Author:
Logan Lowell
